Damn, talking about slackers

> [quantumworld](#comment_384_1AdWXZdPUimpXoGNXUBde2CHR7gLf4onxE): All browsers suck. I just dumped chromium 5 months ago because it was a memory hog. Opera I dumped because it is owned by China. The list goes on and on..  I really think there is an active group out there that is hitting the browser developers on purpose to control content that you are using. I am basing this on statistical analysis of the same problems that users are having. It is always _ user doesn't like _ content and want it all banned because of _ reason. Its like a re occurring script file. Users need to make there own choices as to what they are using and running on there system. And never let the scumbags start dictating what you should or should not say about anything. Every day I am offended by someones online post. And I love it that way.  SJW are nothing more than velvet glove Nazi's. Treat them as such and this problem will go away very quickly.

I know what you mean, I will be working on a project to create a whole new kind of browser / app / website thing. Stay tuned! First I have to clean up my room ;)

> [quantumworld](#comment_388_1AdWXZdPUimpXoGNXUBde2CHR7gLf4onxE): 

Well, you don't have to be that way. I'm an experienced software architect with more than 20 years of experience. I can do some great things, but you don't have to be pissy about it.

I am sure you will use a branch of open source code that is already out there. Doing it from scratch would be a nightmare. Then again I don't code that much. And btw I am always negative. Is that a problem? (GRRR!) lol..

No, that is not a problem if you can combine it with good humor ;) I'm pro open source and like to use Python, Ruby and Elixir at the moment. Sometimes C and Rust when I'm working on my own operating system.

> [sinewave](#comment_3_14DUMcwNfigWkHzZwwZ2wX9AfiPxxVzYbR): You can mute him. Right click the three dots on the right of any comment and you have the option of muting a particular user. You won't see any of their comments on any post anymore (although everyone else will, of course).

That might be my problem, I don't see those 3 dots

> [duende](#comment_35_13wJrWgzjwKU1zgXJMDCGhkSjsaUvYjZM2): The fucking state of schools in this country, kids don't even know about dictionaries.I pray someone can fuck your brain soon.
